name: viceroyalty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C usually singular ] the job of being viceroy (= a ruler representing a king or queen, ruling for them in another country), or the period when someone is viceroy: From his assumption of the viceroyalty, he saw himself as the preserver of the imperial Anglo-Indian tradition. At the start of his viceroyalty, he was unaware of the scale of injustice.
[ C ] a country or area ruled by a viceroy : As the capital of the Viceroyalty of Peru, Lima was a major economic and cultural centre. Manual workers formed the bulk of the population of this and other viceroyalties.
[ U, + sing/pl verb ] the people who belong to the family of a viceroy (= someone representing a king or queen, ruling for them in another country): It was the first ball in the town attended by vice-royalty. He was at ease in any company, including that of vice-royalty.
